Add.Name: BlogPage
Add.Label: BlogPage
Add.TypeManagerName: <t n="Composite.Data.DataReference`1, Composite, Version=3.1.4400.42718, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null"> <t n="Composite.Data.Types.IPage,Composite" /> </t>

Add.Name: BlogEntriesCount
Add.Label: Blog Entries Count
Add.HelpText: The number of blog entries to display (5 by default).

Add.Name: BlogListOptions
Add.Label: List options
Add.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.String.Selector" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="Show image,Show teaser,Show content,Show author,Show date,Show tags,Show share icons,Show RSS" /></f:function></f:param><f:param name="Multiple" value="True" /></f:widgetfunction>
Add.DefaultValueFunctionMarkup: <f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Constant.String"><f:param name="Constant" value="Show date,Show author,Show teaser, Show image,Show tags,Show share icons" /></f:function>

Add.Name: BlogItemOptions
Add.Label: Item options
Add.WidgetFunctionMarkup: <f:widgetfunction xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Widgets.String.Selector" label="" bindingsourcename=""><f:helpdefinition xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" helptext="" /><f:param xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Options"><f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Utils.String.Split"><f:param name="String" value="Show image,Show teaser,Show content,Show author,Show date,Show tags,Show share icons" /></f:function></f:param></f:widgetfunction>
Add.DefaultValueFunctionMarkup: <f:function xmlns:f="http://www.composite.net/ns/function/1.0" name="Composite.Constant.String"><f:param name="Constant" value="Show content, Show tags, Show share icons,Show date,Show author" /></f:function>

Add.Name: BlogEntryGuid
Add.Label: Blog Entry Guid
Add.HelpText: The Guid of the blog entry the comment refers to.

Add.Name: AllowNewComments
Add.Label: Allow new comments
Add.HelpText: If this option is selected, adding new comments to blog entries will be allowed.

Add.Name: MinFontSize
Add.Label: Minimum Font Size
Add.HelpText: The font size for the tag used in the smallest number of blog entries (10px by default).

Add.Name: MaxFontSize
Add.Label: Maximum Font Size
Add.HelpText: The font size for the tag used in the greatest number of blog entries (22px by default).

Add.Name: BlogPage
Add.Label: BlogPage
